projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

div.head: YRps, Adhyāya 1

lg.l: sakalasiddhagaṇair api sevitām aharahaḥ praṇamāmi ca śāradām //
tataḥ śodhanakaṃ tasya tathāṣṭādaśa karma ca //
tatrāgatā kūpamavekṣamāṇā nivartitā sā mahatā javena //
pradhāvitaḥ sūtavaraścaturṣu kakupsu bhūmau patito hi nūnam //
vistīrṇaṃ ca suvṛttaṃ hi sūtakasya samīritam //
jāyate ruciraḥ sākṣād ucyate pāradaḥ svayam //

div.note: mercury:: subtypes:: caste (after emanation from the well)

lg.l: kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau ca caturṇāṃ jāyate khalu //
prācyāṃ yāmyāṃ pratīcyāṃ ca kauberyāṃ ca diśi kramāt //
mūrcchāṃ mṛtyuṃ madaṃ caiva sphoṭaṃ kuryuḥ śirobhramam //
atha khalvapramāṇaṃ hi vakṣye tatra mayādhunā //
mṛṇmayī sthālikā kāryā cocchritā tu ṣaḍaṃgulā //
iyanmānā dvitīyā ca kartavyā sthālikā śubhā //
culyāṃ sthālīṃ niveśyātha dhānyāgniṃ tatra kārayet //
garte tu sthāpitāṃ bhūmau jvālayenmūrdhni pāvakam //
tiryagghaṭe rasaṃ kṣiptvā tanmukhe hyaparo ghaṭaḥ //
yaṃtrāṇāṃ pātanānāṃ ca tritayaṃ sukaraṃ khalu //
yatkṛte ca palatvaṃ hi rasarājasya śāmyati //
bubhukṣā vyāpakatvaṃ ca yena kṛtvā prajāyate //
yātudhānamukhaṃ samyak yātyeva hi na saṃśayaḥ //
tathā ca daśa karmāṇi dehalohakarāṇi hi //
mānaṃ mānavihīnena kartuṃ kena na śakyate //
yadā jīrṇo bhaved grāsaḥ pātitaśca viḍena hi //
gaṃdhakena samaṃ kṛtvā viḍo 'yaṃ vahnikṛd bhavet //
abhrakaṃ tāpyasatvaṃ ca samaṃ kṛtvā tu saṃdhamet //
jātaṃ tutthasamaṃ nīlaṃ kalkaṃ tatprocyate budhaiḥ //
svahastena kṛtaṃ samyak jāraṇaṃ na śrutaṃ mayā //
sāraṇārthe kṛtaṃ tailaṃ tasmin taile supācayet //
śāstrātkṛtaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ hi yathāvat krāmayedrasam //
etānyeva samāni ca kṛtvā dravyāṇi mardayecca dinam //
bījāni pāradasyāpi kramate ca na saṃśayaḥ //
siddhasūtena ca samaṃ marditaṃ vedhakṛd bhavet //
drute tāmre 'thavā raupye rasaṃ tatra vinikṣipet //
tathaiva jāyate vedhaḥ śabdavedhaḥ sa kathyate //
tanmadhye pāradaṃ kṣiptvā dhmānād rañjanakaṃ bhavet //
anubhūtaṃ mayā kiṃcit gurūṇāṃ hi prasādataḥ //
tata uddhṛtya vastreṇa baṃdhanaṃ kārayed bhiṣak //
vaṃgasya stambhanaṃ samyak karotyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
kṣīraṃ śoṣayate nityaṃ kautukārthe na saṃśayaḥ //
āsāṃ niyāmikānāṃ ca rasaṃ vastreṇa gālayet //
rasagolaṃ suvṛttaṃ tu śuṣkaṃ caivātha lepayet //
kathitaṃ tanmayā spaṣṭaṃ nānubhūtaṃ na ceṣṭitam //
pidhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ kuryān mukhaṃ tenātha rundhayet //
bhājanāni ca catvāri caturdikṣu gatāni ca //
śvetā punarnavā ciṃcā sahadevī ca nīlikā //
yāmatrayaṃ prayatnena dhautaḥ paścād gavāṃ jalaiḥ //
jāyate nātra saṃdeho baddhaḥ śivasamo bhavet //
bījaṃ śāṇapramāṇaṃ hi sūtaṃ palamitaṃ bhavet //
khātaṃ trihastamātraṃ syāl laddīpūrṇaṃ tu kārayet //
prakāśito mayā samyak nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
gojihvā kākamācī ca nirguṃḍī dugdhikā tathā //
vaktre dhṛtaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ nihanti ca na saṃśayaḥ //
kurvanti ye tattvavido bhiṣagvarā rājñāṃ gṛhe te'pi bhavanti pūjyāḥ //
sakalaguṇavariṣṭhā vādinaḥ kautukajñā nijahṛdi ca sukaṇṭhe dhārayiṣyanti tajjñāḥ //
supayasā lavaṇena vimarditaṃ kuru bhiṣagvara yantrasurodhanam //
upari tatra jalena niṣiñcayed iti bhaveddaradād varasūtakaḥ //
uditadhātugaṇasya ca mūṣikāṃ kuru viṣaṃ viniveśaya tatra vai //
saghanasārarasaḥ kila kāntidas tv akhilakuṣṭhaharaḥ kathito mayā //
praharayugmamitaṃ ca śilātale ravikareṇa vimardya vicūrṇitau //
kuru bhiṣagvara vahnim adhastataḥ sa ca bhavedaruṇaḥ kamalacchaviḥ //
gatabalena nareṇa susevito bhavati vājikaraḥ sukhadaḥ sadā //
sa ca valīpalitāni vināśayec chataśaratsu nirāmayakṛtparam //
satatameva vimardya śilātale balivasāṃ ca samāṃ kuru tadbhiṣak //
tadanu sūtavarasya tu kajjalīṃ rucirakācaghaṭe viniveśaya //
sa khalu karmavipākajarogahā viśadanāgayutaḥ khalu pāradaḥ //
rasavaraṃ daśaśāṇamitaṃ hi tat saśukapicchavareṇa nidhāpayet //
sthagaya taṃ ca pidhānavareṇa vai mṛditayā sumṛdā parimudritam //
vidhividā bhiṣajā hyamunā kṛto vimalaṣaḍguṇagandhakam aśnute //
śataguṇaṃ hi yadā parijīryate rasavaraḥ khalu hemakaro bhavet //
sikatayā paripūrya tadardhakaṃ tadanu tatra niveśaya poṭṭalīm //
iti mayā kathitā rasapoṭalī balakarā sukarā sukhasiddhidā //
tridinameva hi haṃsapadīrase dinakarasya kareṇa suśoṣitaḥ //
karamitā sukṛtāpi hi cuhlikā hy upari tatra niveśaya ca bhājanaṃ //
tadanu vahnimadhaḥ kuru vai dṛḍhaṃ satatameva hi yāmacatuṣṭayam //
sa ca valīpalitāni vināśayet sakalakuṣṭhavināśakaraḥ paraḥ //
rasavaraṃ vimalaṃ ca suśobhitaṃ saśukapicchasamaṃ parimarditam //
kanakamūlarasena ca pācitaṃ tadanu saptadinaṃ kṛśavahninā //
dinamukhe pratihanti subhakṣitaḥ sakaladoṣakṛtāṃ vikṛtiṃ jayet //
balivasāṃ ca ghṛtena vimardayed atikṛśāgnikṛte dravati svayam //
drutamayaṃ ca sadāyasabhājane tadanu sūtakṛtāṃ varakajjalīm //
bhavati sāratamā rasaparpaṭī sakalarogavighātakarī hi sā //
aṣṭādaśa ca kuṣṭhāni nihantyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
eraṃḍamūlasya rasena sūtaṃ tathādrikarṇyā svarasena mardayet //
krameṇa sūtaṃ hi dinaiścaturbhiḥ śuddhatvamāyāti hi niścayena //
pradrāvayettaṃ badarasya cāgninā praḍhālayed bhṛṃgarase trivāram //
praḍhālayettāṃ kadalīdale hi saṃchādya cānyena dalena paścāt //
tasyās tv adhordhvaṃ pradadīta gomayaṃ śītīkṛtā gavyaghṛtena bharjitā /
gulmāni cāṣṭāvudarāṇi hanyāt saṃsevitā śuddharasasya parpaṭī //
mayāpi sadvaidyahitāya nūnaṃ pradarśiteyaṃ khalu roganāśinī //
tasyāṃ nidhāyātha rasasya golakaṃ taṃ sveditaṃ cāmlarasena samyak //

l.seg: yaḥ śrīsūtavarasya sevanamidaṃ nityaṃ karotīha vai

lg.l: loke kīrtiparaṃparāṃ vitanute dharme matirjāyate prānte tasya parā gatirhi niyataṃ satyaṃ śivenoditam //
ete'ṣṭau dhātavo jñeyā lohānyevaṃ bhavanti hi //
anye trayaḥ suvarṇasya prakārāḥ santi noditāḥ //
hemakāryaṃ na cettena tadā śodhyaṃ bhiṣagvaraiḥ //
evaṃ puṭatrayaṃ dattvā śuddhaṃ hema samuddharet //
mriyate nātra saṃdeho nirutthaṃ bhasma jāyate //
satyaṃ saṃpuṭake nidhāya daśabhiścaivaṃ puṭaiḥ kukkuṭaiḥ pācyaṃ hema ca raktagairikasamaṃ saṃjāyate niścitam //
mardayed dinam ekaṃ tu saṃpuṭe dhārayettataḥ //
dehaṃ lohaṃ ca matimān sudhanī sādhayedidam //

l.seg: etatsvarṇabhavaṃ karotica rajaḥ saundaryatāṃ vai sadā

lg.l: yaḥ seveta naraḥ samān dvidaśakān vṛddhaśca no jāyate doṣāścaiva garodbhavā viṣakṛtā āgantujā naiva hi //
kṛtrimaṃ ca trayo bhedāḥ kathitāḥ pūrvasūribhiḥ //

l.seg: rūpyaṃ hi miśraṃ khalu doṣalaṃ ca

lg.l: tacchodhayedvai bhasitasya mūṣyāṃ sīsena sārdhaṃ rajataṃ tu dhmāpayet //
mūṣāmadhye tu tāṃ muktvā adhordhvaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ nyaset //
madhye śulbaṃ sthāpanīyaṃ prayatnāt tasyordhvaṃ vai gaṃdhacūrṇasya cārdham //
cullyāṃ ca kuryādatha vahnimeva yāmatrayeṇaiva supācitaṃ bhavet //
sevyaṃ samyak caikavallapramāṇaṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ hanti gulmapramehān //
pariṇāmabhavaṃ śūlaṃ tathā cāṣṭavidhaṃ ca ruk //
kāṃtaṃ tathā tīkṣṇavaraṃ hi muṇḍaṃ lohaṃ bhavedvai trividhaṃ krameṇa //
saṃdrāvakaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ tathā hi saṃkathyate śāstravidai rasajñaiḥ //
mriyate nātra saṃdeho hy anubhūtaṃ mayaiva hi //
takramadhye trivāraṃ hi miśraṃ baṃgaṃ viśudhyati //
anena vidhinā śeṣam apakvaṃ mārayed dhruvam //
tasyopari ca patrāṇi samāni parito nyaset //
evaṃ nāgo viśuddhaḥ syān mūrcchāsphoṭādi nācaret //
lohapātre drute nāge gharṣaṇaṃ tu prakārayet //
taptā tuṣajale kṣiptā śuklavarṇā tu rītikā //
nikṣiptā kāṃjike kṛṣṇā sā smṛtā kākatuṇḍikā //
masṛṇāṅgī tu susnigdhā śubhā rītīti kathyate //
anyāni śāstrāṇi suvistarāṇi nirīkṣya yatnātkṛtameva samyak //
śvetaṃ raktaṃ tathā pītaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paramasuṃdaram //
anena vidhinā proktā bhedāḥ santīha ṣoḍaśa //
sevitaṃ tanmṛtiṃ hanti vajrābhaṃ kurute vapuḥ //
kṣaṇaṃ cāgnau na tiṣṭheta maṃḍūkasadṛśāṃ gatim //
maṃḍūkābhraṃ na sevyaṃ hi kathitaṃ rasavedibhiḥ //
rasena marditaṃ gāḍham abhrāṃśena tu ṭaṃkaṇam //
bhūtonmādanivāraṇaṃ smṛtikaraṃ śophāmayadhvaṃsanaṃ sadyaḥ prāṇavivardhanaṃ jvaraharaṃ sevyaṃ sadā cābhrakam //
mākṣikaṃ ca samāṃśāni sarvāṇyeva tu kārayet //
khadirasya tu cāṃgāraiḥ satvaṃ niḥsarati dhruvam //
kṣayaṃ pāṇḍuṃ grahaṇikāṃ śvāsaṃ śūlaṃ sakāmalam //
taulye guruśca masṛṇo rājāvartto varaḥ smṛtaḥ //
dolāyantreṇa yāmau dvau śudhyatyeva hi sasyakam //
dhmātaṃ ca tāmrarūpaṃ hi sattvaṃ muñcati sasyakam //
anayormudraikā kāryā śūlaghnī sā bhavet khalu //
taṭe tapatyāḥ saṃjātaṃ tāpyākhyaṃ mākṣikaṃ vadet //
tadā tāmraprabhaṃ satvaṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
melanaṃ kurute lohe paramaṃ ca rasāyanam //
śṛṅgasya bhasmanā cāpi puṭaiśca daśadhā puṭet //
drute gaṃdhe hi nikṣiptaṃ tālakaṃ triguṇaṃ tathā //
udake ca vilīyeta tacchuddhaṃ ca vidhīyate //
ye guṇāḥ kathitāḥ sadbhiḥ śilādhātau vadanti te //
palitaṃ valibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hanyādeva na saṃśayaḥ //
tena svargamayī siddhir arjitā nātra saṃśayaḥ //
tadā sīsopamaṃ satvaṃ patatyeva na saṃśayaḥ //
nihanti madhumehaṃ ca kṣayaṃ pāṇḍuṃ tathānilam //

div.head: YRps, Adhyāya 6

lg.l: sūkṣmapatraṃ hemavarṇaṃ guru snigdhaṃ ca bhāsuram //
yavābhā guṭikā kāryā śuṣkā kupyāṃ nidhāya ca //
yā lepitā śvetavastre raṅgabandhakarī hi sā //
śyāmā raktā miśravarṇā bhārāḍhyā śyāmikā bhavet //
cūrṇitā yāti raktāṅgī guruḥ snigdhā ca khaṇḍikā //
dhmātā tu koṣṭhikāyantre muñcet sattvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //

l.seg: sauvīraṃ ca rasāṃjanaṃ nigaditaṃ srotoṃjanaṃ caiva hi

lg.l: pañcānāmapi nāmavarṇaguṇavadrūpāṇi samyagvidhau kathyante'tra mayāpi śodhanam idaṃ satvaṃ mṛtiścocyate //
netravyādhau śodhane ropaṇe ca śreṣṭhaṃ proktaṃ karṇarogapraśāṃtyai //
snigdhaṃ svādu kaṣāyakaṃ viṣavamīpittāsranullekhanaṃ netryaṃ hidhmarujāpahaṃ nigaditaṃ srotoṃjanaṃ sarvadā //
śilāyāḥ satvavat sattvam añjanānāṃ ca pātayet //
jāyate nātra saṃdeho hy anubhūtaṃ mayā khalu //
rase rasāyane śreṣṭhaḥ śukapicchaḥ sa kathyate //
saṃsevanādvajrasamaṃ śarīraṃ bhavetsukāntaṃ hi nirāmayaṃ ca //
gaṃdhakasya guṇānvaktuṃ śaktaḥ kaḥ śaṃbhunā vinā //
ekameva nalikābhidhānakaṃ reṇukaṃ tadanu cāparaṃ bhavet //

div.note: kaṅkuṣṭha:: third type from the feces of a newborn elephant

lg.l: vadanti kaṃkuṣṭhamathāpare hi sadyaḥ prasūtasya ca dantinaḥ śakṛt /
tat kṛṣṇapītaṃ bhavatīva recanaṃ tṛtīyamāhurvibudhā bhiṣagvarāḥ //
śuṃṭhyambhasā bhāvitameva śuddhiṃ kaṃkuṣṭhamāyāti hi satyamuktam //
tāṃbūlena samaṃ caivaṃ bhakṣitaṃ sārayed dhruvam //
bhūyo bhūyaḥ pibeddhīmān viṣaṃ kaṃkuṣṭhajaṃ jayet //
śvitraghnaṃ mukhakeśaraṃjanakaraṃ tatsaikataṃ pūrvakaṃ puṣpākhyaṃ hyaparaṃ guṇaiśca sahitaṃ sevyaṃ sadā rogahṛt //
śreṣṭhā saiva budhaiḥ proktā ṭaṅkabhārā hi madhyamā //
carmāraḥ prathamaḥ prokto hīnasatvaḥ sa ucyate //
svādu tiktaṃ himaṃ netryaṃ kaṣāyaṃ raktapittanut //
biḍaṃ hi kathyate tadvat sarvadoṣaharaṃ param //
vajraṃ nīlaṃ ca gomedaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ ca krameṇa hi //
dvitīyaṃ nīlagandhi syād ghanaṃ raktaṃ suśobhanam //
samaṃ vṛttāyataṃ gātre māṇikyaṃ cottamaṃ matam //
karkaśaṃ cipiṭaṃ vakraṃ sūkṣmaṃ cāviśadaṃ tathā //
bhūtādidoṣatrayanāśanaṃ paraṃ rājñāṃ sadā yogyatamaṃ praśastam //
snigdhaṃ taulye gauravaṃ cenmahattal liṃgairetair lakṣitaṃ tacca śuddham //
kṣārābhāsaṃ vaikaṭaṃ yugmakaṃ ca doṣairyuktaṃ sarvathā tyājyamebhiḥ //
khyātaṃ sadbhiḥ saptadhā vidrumaṃ ca doṣairmuktaṃ sarvakāryeṣu śastam //
doṣairyuktaṃ koṭarairāvṛtaṃ ca neṣṭaṃ sadbhir bhakṣaṇe dhāraṇe ca //
bhūtonmādān netrarogān nihanyāt sadyaḥ kuryāddīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca //
ete proktā saptasaṃkhyā guṇā vai dāne śastaṃ bhakṣaṇe dhāraṇe ca //
duṣṭaṃ tārkṣyaṃ cauṣadhenopayojyaṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ sannipātāgnimāṃdyam //
śophaṃ śūlaṃ jūrtirogaṃ viṣaṃ ca durnāmānaṃ pāṇḍurogaṃ nihanyāt //
taccāvakraṃ masṛṇaṃ komalaṃ ca liṃgairetaiḥ śobhanaṃ puṣparāgam //
doṣairyuktaṃ niṣprabhaṃ puṣparāgaṃ no sevyaṃ tannaiva deyaṃ dvijebhyaḥ //
dāhe kṛcchre dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca tasmātsevyaṃ sarvakālaṃ manuṣyaiḥ //
naraśca nārī ca tathā tṛtīyaṃ teṣāṃ guṇānvacmi samāsato hi //
teṣāṃ varṇā jātayaśca prabhedāḥ kathyante'ṣṭau śāstrataścāpakarṣāt //
śvetādikaṃ varṇacatuṣṭayaṃ hi sarveṣu ratneṣu ca kathyate budhaiḥ /
aṣṭau cetsyuḥ phālakā bhāsuraṃ vai pūrvaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadoṣāpahaṃ syāt //
koṇāgraṃ vai kuṇṭhitaṃ vartulaṃ ca kiṃciddhīnaṃ procyate tattṛtīyam //

lg.l: vyatyāsādvai naiva dattaṃ phalaṃ tad dadyād vajraṃ vā vinā tatpumāṃsam //
nyāyaścāyaṃ bhairaveṇa pradiṣṭaḥ sarveṣveva ratnavargeṣu samyak //
siddhaṃ tathā kodravaje śṛte vā vajraṃ viśudhyeddhi viniścitena //
chucchuṃdarīsthaṃ hi vipācitaṃ puṭe puṭedvarāheṇa ca triṃśadevam //
dhmātaṃ punardhmāya śataṃ hi vārān kvāthe kulatthasya hi nikṣipecca /
saṃpeṣayettaṃ hi śilātalena manaḥśilābhiḥ saha kārayedvaṭīm //
kṣiptvā nirundhyāpi ca mūṣikāyāṃ puṭānyathāṣṭau ca vanopalairdadet /
vārān śataṃ cāpi tato dhamettaṃ saṃmarditaṃ śodhitapāradena //
vajrāṇi sarvāṇi mṛtībhavanti tadbhasmakaṃ vāritaraṃ bhavecca /
śrīsomadevena ca satyavācā vajrasya mṛtyuḥ kathito hi samyak //
sveditaṃ ca bhiduraṃ hi saptabhirvāsaraiḥ pariniṣecya mūtrake //
dhmāpitaṃ hi khalu vajrasaṃjñakaṃ mārayediti vadanti tadvidaḥ /
nīlajvālāvīrudhaḥ kandakeṣu ghṛṣṭaṃ gharme śoṣitaṃ bhasmabhāvam //
vajraṃ caivaṃ bhasmasādvīryayuktaṃ sarvasminvai yojanīyaṃ rasādau //
rasendrakasyāpi hi baṃdhakṛtsadā sudhāsamaṃ cāpamṛtiṃ ca hanyāt //
dhmātaṃ rasādāvapi yojanīyaṃ rasāyanaṃ tadbhavatīha samyak //
vajrasya bhūtiḥ kila poṭalīkṛtā mukhe dhṛtā dārḍhyakarī dvijānām //
aṣṭabhāgamiha tārakaṃ kuru sūtamatra samabhāgakaṃ sadā //
vaikrāṃtabhasmātra tathāṣṭabhāgakaṃ ṣaḍeva bhāgā hi balervidheyāḥ //
kāntyā yuktaṃ kārṣṇyagarbhaṃ ca nīlaṃ taccāpyuktaṃ śakranīlābhidhānam //
nīlaṃ proktaṃ piṇḍitaṃ saptasaṃjñair etair liṅgair lakṣitaṃ cottamaṃ hi //
proktaṃ vai tadvārinīlaṃ bhiṣagbhir etairliṃgaiḥ saptabhiḥ kṣepaṇīyam //
ebhir liṅgairlakṣitaṃ vai garīyaḥ sarvāsvetadyojanīyaṃ kriyāsu //
nirbhāraṃ vā pītakācābhayuktaṃ gomedaṃ cedīdṛśaṃ no variṣṭham //
sarveṣu ratneṣu ca pañcadoṣāḥ sādhāraṇāste kathitā munīndraiḥ //
ye kṣetratoyaprabhavāśca doṣāḥ sarveṣu ratneṣu galanti samyak //
amlena vai śudhyati māṇikyākhyaṃ jayantikāyāḥ svarasena mauktikam //
dhānyasyāmlaiḥ puṣparāgasya śuddhiṃ kaulatthe vai kvāthyamānaṃ hi vajram //
vajravarjyamapi cāṣṭabhiḥ puṭai ratnabhasma bhavatīti niścitam //
vastreṇa saṃveṣṭya tataḥ prayatnād dolākhyayaṃtre'tha niveśya golakam /
sarvāmlayukte tuṣavāripūrite pātraṃ dṛḍhe mṛṇmayasaṃjñake hi //
lohasya vedhaṃ prakaroti samyak sūtena samyaṅmilanaṃ prayāti //
yāmadvayaṃ kāṃsyavimarditā vai cātiprayatnena tu vaidyavaryaiḥ //
tāsāṃ madhye durlabhābhradrutiśca svalpaṃ bhāgyaṃ bhūridaurbhāgyabhājām //
sarveṣāṃ hi parīkṣaṇaṃ ca drutayaḥ sammelanaṃ vai rase adhyāye'tra nidarśitāni sakalānyevaṃ hi karmāṇi vai //
rasanigamasudhābdhau mathyamāne mayaiva gaṇitarasaśatānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ procyate vai //
ruddhvātha bhāṇḍe vipacecca cullyāṃ yāmadvayaṃ śītagataṃ samuddharet //
taṃ nāgavallīdalajena sārdhaṃ nihanti vātodbhavakaṃ jvaraṃ ca //
bhakṣitā jvaragaṇān nihantyayaṃ recano jvaraharo'yam aṅkuśaḥ //
eka eva kathitastu so'malaḥ svedito'pi saha cūrṇajalena /
ākallo vai gaṃdhakaḥ sārṣapeṇa tailenātho śodhito buddhimadbhiḥ //
cūrṇaṃ caitad bhāvayettadrasena māṣaistulyāṃ kārayettadvaṭīṃ ca //
doṣodbhūtaṃ sannipātodbhavāṃ ca jūrtiṃ samyaṅ nāśayatyāśu tīvrām //
dhūrtādbījaṃ kārayedvai triśaṇaṃ sarvebhyo vai dvaiguṇā hemadugdhā //
cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā marditaṃ daṃtitoyair guṃjāmātro bhakṣitaścejjvarāriḥ //
trīṇyevaite hiṃgulasyāpi turyaḥ sadyo jūrtiṃ nāśayatyeva sūryaḥ //
tāmrasyaivaṃ bhāgayugmaṃ prakuryād bhallātaṃ vā vedabhāgaṃ tathaiva //
sthālīmadhye sthāpitaṃ tacca golaṃ dattvā mudrāṃ bhasmanā saiṃdhavena //
paścāttoyenaiva bhāvyaṃ ca cūrṇaṃ golaṃ kṛtvā maṃdavahnau vipācya //
paścādenaṃ bhakṣayedvai rasendraṃ vallaṃ caikaṃ śarkarācūrṇamiśram //
cūrṇairetaiḥ śaṃkhamāpūritaṃ vai bhāṇḍe sthāpyaṃ mudritavyaṃ prayatnāt //
dattvā gharme trīṇi cātho puṭāni dadyāttadvat kanyakāyā rasena //
śvāse śūle cānile śleṣmaje vā kāse'rśaḥsu viḍgrahe cātisāre //
guṃjāmātrā nirmitā bhakṣitā hi guṭyo hanyuḥ sannipātātisārān //
kṛṣṇāyuktaṃ śuddhamākallakaṃ syāt sarvāṇyevaṃ cūrṇayedvai samāni //
khalve sarvaṃ marditaṃ caikayāmaṃ kāryā golī vallamātrā jalena //
dhūrtasyaivaṃ bījakānīha śuddhāny evaṃ kṛtvā tacca cūrṇaṃ vidheyam //
dadhyannaṃ vā bhojayettakrayuktaṃ hanyād evaṃ cāgnimāndyaṃ sutīvram //
somavallī tathā sobhav ṛkṣaṃ somakalā latā //
vārāhī saptapattrā ca nāginī sarpiṇī tathā //
mālārjunī veṇukā ca śikhipādā ca tiktikā //
potakī ca viṣaghnī ca bṛhatī garuḍī tathā //
vṛścikālī guḍūcī ca vāsā śṛṅgī ca kathyate //
sūtasya māraṇe proktā jāraṇe ca niyāmane //
jantupādī ca nirguṇḍī drākṣā nīlotpalaṃ śamī //
vārṣikī śālmalī jātī grīṣmavarṣā tu yūthikā //
nāhī kanyā tathā somarājikā ca ṭuṭumbhaṭī //
kathitā varamūṣā sā yāmaṃ vahniṃ saheta vai //
satvānāṃ drāvaṇe śuddhau mūṣā sā gostanī bhavet //
pakvamūṣā kulālabhāṇḍarūpā yā dṛḍhā ca paripācitā /
garbhamūṣā tu sā jñeyā pāradasya nibandhinī //
mūṣā sā musalākhyā syāc cakrībaddharase hitā //
dvāraṃ ceṣṭikayā ruddhvā saṃdhirodhaṃ ca kārayet //
kukkuṭākhyaṃ puṭaṃ vidyād auṣadhānāṃ ca sādhanam //
tadahaṃ sampravakṣyāmi yatkṛtvā nā sukhī bhavet //
tena vedhyaṃ drutaṃ tāmraṃ tāraṃ vā nāgameva vā //
jalabhedo yadā na syān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
tutthakaṃ vallamātraṃ ca dattvā hema pragālayet //
vārtikendrāḥ kurudhvaṃ hi satyaṃ guruvaco yathā //
dvau varṇau vardhate samyak nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
varṇotkarṣo jāyate tena samyak satyaṃ proktaṃ nandinā kautukāya //

l.seg: hiṃgūlaṃ vai hema śuddhaṃ śilā ca

lg.l: cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā nikṣipet kācakūpyām āpūryānte svai rasaiḥ śākajairvā //
śuddhaṃ tāraṃ vedhitaṃ vallakena gadyāṇaṃ vai jāyate śuddhahema //
tolamekaṃ suvarṇaṃ hi jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
vāpitā drāvite dravye sarvaṃ tāmraṃ tu saṃkṣipet //
tena tāmreṇa rasakaṃ saptavāraṃ ca vāhayet //
svarṇavarṇaṃ hi tattāmraṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
lohaṃ ca rasakaṃ paścād gālitaṃ vajramūṣayā //
yavamātrāṃ guṭīṃ kṛtvā viśoṣya cātape khare //
tārasaṃpuṭamadhye tu dhāritaṃ taṃ ca golakam //
dhānyābhraṃ tulyaṃ paṃkena kṛtvā śrāvaṃ tu pūrayet /
jāyate pravaraṃ tāraṃ satyam etad udīritam //
vaṃgaṃ tālakamabhrakaṃ śaśirasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viṣaṃ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ /
tena vedhyaṃ drutaṃ tāmraṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśena yatnataḥ //
vallaṃ gadyāṇake dadyād baṃgaṃ stambhayate dhruvam //
bhasma mūṣopari nyasya dhmāpayecca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ //
eraṇḍataile ghṛṣṭaṃ tad dhāritaṃ kharpare vare //
tāmrapātre tu yallagnaṃ sarvaṃ sattvaṃ samāharet //
deyaṃ tadvallamātraṃ hi drute tāmre tu sattvakam //
śaṃkhābhaṃ jāyate tāraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā //
śuddhaṃ rūpyaṃ ṣoḍaśākhyaṃ hi samyak jātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nānṛtaṃ satyametat //
anena vidhinā pūryā dvitīyā mūṣikā śubhā //
mauktikāni hi jāyante kṛtānyevaṃ mayā khalu //
tasya paṃkasya guṭikāṃ masṛṇāṃ tu prakārayet //
saptakāni ca pañcaivam āhāraṃ madhuraṃ bhajet //
rasaṃ tathā śālmalimadhyamūlāt prasthaṃ sitārdhāḍhakamatra deyam //
supācitaṃ vai mṛduvahninā tathā darvīpralepo'pi hi jāyate yathā /
tvakpatrakailāḥ saha kesareṇa palapramāṇā hi tato vidadhyāt //
lehe suśīte madhu bilvamātraṃ prātaḥ prabhakṣediha karṣamātram //
cūrṇīkṛtaṃ gālitameva vastrād bhṛṣṭaṃ tathājyena sitāsametam //
kāmasya bodhaṃ kurute hi śīghraṃ nārīṃ ramedvai caṭakāyate'sau //
saṃcūrṇya sarvaṃ pṛthageva pālikaṃ kṣīreṇa pācyaṃ daśabhāgakena //
vīryasya vṛddhiṃ jaṭharāgnivṛddhiṃ kāmāgnivṛddhiṃ sahasā karoti //
dugdhamadhye vipācyainaṃ dinānyevaṃ hi pañca ca //

l.seg: etaiḥ samānamahiphenamanena cābhraṃ śvetaṃ nidhāya madhunā vaṭakān vidadhyāt

lg.l: māṣadvayonmitamamuṃ niśi bhakṣayitvā mṛṣṭaṃ payastadanu māhiṣamāśu pītvā kurvantu kāmukajanāḥ pratiruddhapātāścetāṃsi tāni cakitāni kalāvatīnām //
postakaṃ palamekaṃ vai śuṃṭhīkarṣaḥ sitā palaikā ca /
karṣamitā tvakpayasā pītaṃ reto dhruvaṃ dhatte //
sadvaidyena yaśodhareṇa kavinā vidvajjanānandakṛd grantho'yaṃ grathitaḥ karotu satataṃ saukhyaṃ satāṃ mānase //
tasmin śaṃbhupadāravindaratikṛcchrīpadmanābhaḥ svayam tatputreṇa yaśodhareṇa kavinā graṃthaḥ svayaṃ nirmitaḥ //
śrīmaddurgapurātane 'tinipuṇaḥ śrīpadmanābhātmajaḥ śrīmadbhaṭṭayaśodharaḥ kavivaro granthaḥ svayaṃ nirmame //
